mapper.insert: insert into board (boardtype, usernum, nickname, subject, content, photo, readcount, likes, report, writeday) values (#{boardtype}, #{usernum}, #{nickname}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{photo}, 0, 0, 0, now())
mapper.select:
select count(*) from board
where ${searchcolumn} like concat('%',#{searchword},'%')
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount+1 where boardnum = #{boardnum}
-- 좋아요 증가 update board set likes=likes+1 where boardnum=#{boardnum}
-- 좋아요 감소 update board set likes=likes-1 where boardnum=#{boardnum}
mapper.select: -- 게시물보다 작은 넘버중 제일 큰 넘버를 가진 게시물 (이전게시물) select MAX(boardnum) from board where boardnum < #{boardnum}
-- 게시물보다 큰 넘버중 제일 작은 넘버를 가진 게시물 (다음게시물) select MIN(boardnum) from board where boardnum > #{boardnum}
-- 제일 최신글에 다음글버튼 안보이게 하기 SELECT MAX(boardnum) from board
-- 제일 오래된글에 이전글버튼 안보이게 하기 SELECT MIN(boardnum) from board
-- 자유 질문 나누기 select * from board where boardtype=#{boardtype}
